AGI TR Unit 1
Loading of AGI TR Unit 1 on SPMT; lashing; Shifting to Mina Zayed Port RoRo Jetty area
RoRo Ramp Installation - 5t Frokift and Crane required
Load-out of AGL TR Unit 1; stool down (8am-10am)
RoRo ramp removal; Seafastening AGL TR Unit 1 - Crane required
MWS; MPI; Sail-away - Marine Transportation by LCT to Al Ghallan Island

LCT Sails back to MZP to collect TR Unit 1
Steel bridge Installation - Crane required

Jacking down of AGI TR Unit 1 (TR Bay 4) on temporary support - Forklift required
SPMT shifting back to Port
